name: Island village
description:
Island village  is a small simulation strategy game . Build your village from the ground up on an island where  resources and free space are limited.  

Collect resources to expand your village and gather food to  keep your people from starving. Increase  population to unlock new parts of the island.

(Check screenshots to get a quick tip on resource gathering )

Credits:

Thank you for playing!!  If you liked the game please consider supporting it in any way you want
